synopsis.text:
Evil lurks in the shadows, but a unique team of assassins, disguised as hospital staff and local teenagers, stand ready to eradicate the malevolent forces that threaten society in the anime series "Black Label." Led by the charismatic chairman of Mochizuki General Hospital, this skilled group targets the worst criminals, from ruthless arms dealers to corrupt politicians, eliminating them before their wickedness can spread like a deadly disease.

Among the team is high school student Arashi Mikami, who joins the group after a tragic terrorist attack claims the lives of his family and best friend. Rescued by a surgeon who is far from ordinary, Arashi finds new purpose as a member of Black Label. Despite the danger that surrounds them, the team still finds time for steamy encounters and playful antics, adding a touch of romance and humor to their perilous mission.

With their unique blend of medical and combat skills, the members of Black Label fight to cleanse the world of evil, one target at a time. Haunted by their pasts but united in their purpose, they excise the cancers of society with ruthless efficiency, leaving no trace of their deadly deeds. Join Arashi and his team as they navigate the treacherous world of vigilante justice in this thrilling anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
